title: Yankee wa Isekai de Seirei ni Aisaremasu. - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Delinquents   Dense Protagonist   Fantasy World   Lack of Common Sense   Male Protagonist   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Transported to Another World
author: Kuroi Heiho
description:
Manai Zero is a Yankee (delinquent) with scary eyes.

He was hated and misunderstood by everyone.

Every day, somebody would pick a fight with him and he’d beat them up and scare people.

However, he saved a kid that came darting out from the park and got hit by a truck.

When he next opened his eyes, he wasn’t sure where he was, and there was a guy he didn’t know.

Second life? Another world? Skill? 『The Man Loved by Spirits』?

The Yankee with scary eyes leads his second life in another world!>
